CustomField.formula:
text(Letter_Code__c) +
If(ispickval( Mode__c ,"Electric"),"28",
CASE( Engine__c , "Cummins ISL/L9 8.9 Liter", "27", "Cummins L9 8.9 Liter", "27","Cummins ISL 8.3 Liter","27",
"Cummins ISL-G", "31", "Cummins L9N 8.9 Liter", "31", "Cummins ISL-G Near Zero 8.9 Liter","31","Cummins ISL-G 8.9 Liter","31", "Cummins ISL G / ISLG Near Zero / ISLG NZ 8.9 Liter","31",
"Cummins ISB","30","Cummins B6.7 6.7 Liter","30",
"Cummins ISM","21",
"Electric", "28","TBD"))
+ CASE(Length__c, "30","A","35","B","40","D","29","E","TBD")
+ text( Width__c) + text(Rear_Suspension__c)
CustomField.label: Model
